response.answer_text: Surprisingly, I don’t find her all that good-looking nor that ugly. Of course, I’m one of those types of people whose perception of beauty is wholly dependent on emotional attachments to women’s personalities. Let’s see, what do I know Miley Cyrus from? First, there was that Hannah Montana show. I was never totally drawn towards her character. All I knew was that she was just a celebrity keeping a low profile by living a double life. I wasn’t attracted to her the same way I was attracted to characters on other shows like Keely Teslow from Phil of the Future or Maddie Fitzpatrick from The Suite Life of Zack and Cody. I like her music, but it still doesn’t help me think of her as anything more than neutral in appearance. Of course, I like her old music and none of the newer stuff (which isn’t quite my style). So that gives me even less reason to think of her as exceptionally beautiful.
